title: Sonam Kapoor’s rendezvous with ‘I hate Luv Storys’ co-star and friend Imran Khan
text: Source: Bollywood Gossip - 1 week ago Salman Khan and Sonam Kapoor Shared Same Cup at "Prem Ratan Dhan Payo" Trailer Launch 01:10 The trailer launch of Salman Khan’s upcoming film Prem Ratan Dhan Payo was special in many ways. First Salman shared the stage with Sooraj Barjatya for a film after 16 years and second it was a delight to see the sizzling chemistry between him and his leading lady Sonam Kapoor.
